channel.title: Help with BCEL Please!
channel.description:
Hello everybody,
I'm not to active here but I am at many other forums and will be more here. I have a reflection bot and I have an updater. The problem is the updater is old and most of the hooks, about 40 of them, have broken because they had bad patterns. I am pretty new to this area and I don't know bytecode or BCEL but I do have some knowledge of Java, however it is limited.
I am wondering about solutions for a few problems I am haveing. First off, I have a list of all the fields I need but I don't know how to make the methods to find the patterns in the bytecode. Which leads me to my next problem, I don't know how to find patterns in the bytecode. I understand about opening it in CFParse and looking for things that never change, but I have nothing to compair it to so I don't know what will change and what won't.
Thank you in advance for those who help and it is much appreciated.
Thanks, Ronny

item.title: Help with BCEL Please!
item.dc:creator: @ronny.m.p ronny.m.p
item.description:
@ronny.m.p wrote:

In the Bin folder? If so that makes it so I can compair but I still have all my other problems. Thanks for the help!

Read full topic

item.title: Help with BCEL Please!
item.dc:creator: @ronny.m.p ronny.m.p
item.description:
@ronny.m.p wrote:

Hello everybody,

I’m not to active here but I am at many other forums and will be more here. I have a reflection bot and I have an updater. The problem is the updater is old and most of the hooks, about 40 of them, have broken because they had bad patterns. I am pretty new to this area and I don’t know bytecode or BCEL but I do have some knowledge of Java, however it is limited.

I am wondering about solutions for a few problems I am haveing. First off, I have a list of all the fields I need but I don’t know how to make the methods to find the patterns in the bytecode. Which leads me to my next problem, I don’t know how to find patterns in the bytecode. I understand about opening it in CFParse and looking for things that never change, but I have nothing to compair it to so I don’t know what will change and what won’t.

Thank you in advance for those who help and it is much appreciated.

Thanks,
